description: This table contains information about the mapping codes received for an external clinical note.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the external clinical note in the record of documents received. Together with DOCUMENT_ID and CONTACT_DATE_REAL, this forms the foreign key to the DOCS_RCVD_CLINICAL_NOTES table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple mapping codes associated with the external clinical note from the DOCS_RCVD_CLINICAL_NOTES table.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: DATA_TYPE_C
columns.description: The data type category ID of the mapping code.

columns.name: CODING_SYSTEM
columns.description: The coding system of the mapping code.

columns.name: CODE
columns.description: The code of the mapping code.
